vsParam:
Hmm, allow me to reintroduce myself...
My name is Totori. I am an alchemist in "Arland".

I also go out for adventures sometimes...
That's about it. Guys, nice to meet you.

Oh, you are both an alchemist and an adventurer?
Sounds awesome! Nice to meet you, too, Totori!

I, I am flattered, I am nothing!
You guys are much more amazing than I am.

You are students and you are all older than me,
I bet you have mastered lots of knowledge.

In comparison, I am just an inexperienced adventurer,
besides that, I can only do a little alchemical work...
No, we are not that good...

Uh, ah... I, I am sorry!
I don't have other meanings...

Ha-ha... We just need to work hard!
But I am not too good to criticize others...

[px], you are also an alchemist, right!?
Alchemy is interesting, huh?

Hehe, it seems that Totori and [px]
hit it off.

Why do you want to be an adventurer, Totori?
Being an alchemist alone could support your life, no?

Ah, uh... Actually, I am looking for my missing mother.
I can't go far without the adventurer's certificate.

Yes. Her name is Gisela Helmold...
Does it ring a bell?
Hmm... Sorry, I never heard of this name.

... Is that so? I thought since I come here,
perhaps mother is...
Hee hee, looks like I was too optimistic.

Ah, don't jump to conclusion! Perhaps we just don't
know it yet! After all, "space-time distortion" happens
all over the world.

Yes. Perhaps you'll run into your
mother someday here!

That would be so nice...
I'll continue my adventure in this world!

How about making the Academy your base of your
adventure? You'll need an alchemical Cauldron, right?

I think this is a good idea. We'd be able to inform you
at once if we learn about the way to send you back.

Guys... I shall accept your kind offer.
Thank you so much!
